channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Reliving the 90s via the Analogue 3D is definitely nostalgic, but excellent hardware can't fix an era of video games we should appreciate but never revisit
item.description: I spent two weeks playing the Analogue 3D and reliving the nostalgia of the Nintendo 64. The hardware is excellent, but I can't recommend this console to everyone.

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene is resigning from Congress after falling out with Trump: See video announcement
item.description: The Georgia congresswoman has been highly critical of the president over his stance on files related to Jeffrey Epstein. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia, a once-loyal supporter of President Donald Trump who has become a critic, said Friday she is resigning from Congress in January.

item.title: Read Epsteins emails as if you hacked into his Gmail account
item.description: Jmail is the best way to read and search through Jeffrey Epstein's emails.
